content.value:
okay - last meeting as an @Experian_UK employee!

Off tomorrow and then on Monday I start my new journey as a Tech Architect for @BJSSLtd 

Swapping one great team for another, but definitely a big, exciting and slightly scary change. Lots to learn and no comfort zone for a bitüòÅ
